Now, spot the line Bit rate, OK? That is what determines final size of my encodings. I have NOT size as target (as Scene groups does, for example 350 or 700 MB). I find very stupid to waste the same amount of the space (and bandwidth - because encodes have purpose ONLY by spreading between people) for movie 1h34 long and 1h46 one...
Another, very important factor is frame-size, this one is 640x360 (hence 360p) and BeforeSes are 480x272 (272p). Bigger frame-sizes needs higher bit-rates what gives - bigger file-size.

Hope I explained something.

Yes, thank you very much. Must feel like teaching 2+2 to 3 year old kids. Very much appreciated.
